page.discussion: The .ORDER_GET() method returns the order expression for the index referenced by the object pointer.

section.title: Example
section.description: Finds the order of the first tag in the production index file.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim indx as P dim order as C tbl = table.current() tag = tbl.index_name_get(1) indx = tbl.index_primary_put(tag) order = indx.order_get()
